TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_George_Bon_Salle, title = George_Bon_Salle, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Bon_Salle} }

S.FORM: George Bon Salle George Bon Salle nalecuh i Chicago, Illinois, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput . George Bon Salle i 1970 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka cacay ku uwac atu silsil pitu, namapili' tu nu Syracuse Nationals putiput . 7 a bulad 1 a demiad, 1935 a mihcaan, George Bon Salle, u miunduay. (mapatay ciniza i 2015 a mihcaan) u canan ku NBA kanatal kanas-mali putiput, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapuyu'en NBA, u Amis-Amilika tatama syubay kanas-mali putiput. izaw 30 a mali-cebang , mikitinay tusa a subal , sawaliyan atu satipan. cacay subal izaw tulu a cu , cacay a cu izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, u zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syubay kanas-mali nisakaput sasasedsed , acasa "Amilika kanas nisakaput sasasedsed", sapuyu'en "Amilika syubay kanas", acasa kakelul han NBA.

George Bon Salle George Bon Salle nalecoh i Chicago, Illinois, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot . George Bon Salle i 1970 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka cacay ko owac ato silsil pito, namapili' to no Syracose Nationals potipot . 7 a bolad 1 a demiad, 1935 a mihcaan, George Bon Salle, o miondoay. (mapatay ciniza i 2015 a mihcaan) o canan ko NBA kanatal kanas-mali potipot, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapoyo'en NBA, o Amis-Amilika tatama syobay kanas-mali potipot. izaw 30 a mali-cebang , mikitinay tosa a sobal , sawaliyan ato satipan. cacay sobal izaw tolo a co , cacay a co izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, o zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syobay kanas-mali nisakapot sasasedsed , acasa "Amilika kanas nisakapot sasasedsed", sapoyo'en "Amilika syobay kanas", acasa kakelol han NBA.
